That's my impression too.  It's a joke because one member of the "family" is a monkey.

My mistake: two monkeys

comment.author: 70251312@N00
22149978@N00
comment._content: Unless their last name was Darnd.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: No, the word was "Darned." This photo was made and circulated by a news service that supplied pix to newspapers. A family newspaper could not have gotten away with using the word "Damn" or even (wink, wink) a sound-alike substitute like "Dam."  So in this case Bain employed a euphemism -- "Darned" in place of "Dam."
